languages.text: "Тогда вы выбрали самую непритязательную их часть. Мой наставник говорил, что корабль подобен телу человека. Если так, то сейчас мы точно в его железных кишках".
"Then you've picked the most unassuming part of it. My mentor used to say that a ship is like the human body. If that's the case, we are definitely standing inside its iron bowels right now."
languages.original_text: "Тогда вы выбрали самую непритязательную их часть. Мой наставник говорил, что корабль подобен телу человека. Если так, то сейчас мы точно в его железных кишках".

traits.locale_text: "Then you have chosen the most unassuming part of it. My mentor used to say that a ship is like the human body. If that is the case, we are definitely standing inside its iron bowels."

"Then you've picked the most unassuming part of it. My mentor used to say that a ship is like the human body. If that's the case, we are definitely standing inside its iron bowels right now."

languages.text: «Entonces ha elegido la zona menos interesante. Mi mentor solía decir que una nave es como el cuerpo humano. Siguiendo su símil, ahora nos encontramos en sus entrañas férreas».
languages.original_text: "Then you've picked the most unassuming part of it. My mentor used to say that a ship is like the human body. If that's the case, we are definitely standing inside its iron bowels right now."

traits.locale_text: «Entonces ha elegido la zona menos interesante. Mi mentor solía decir que una nave es como el cuerpo humano. Siguiendo su símil, ahora nos encontramos en sus entrañas férreas».

languages.text: 「一番地味なところを選んだんでしょう。私の恩師はよく、船は人間の体のようなものだと言っていました。もしそうなら私たちは今、間違いなくその鉄の内側に立っていることになります」
languages.original_text: "Then you've picked the most unassuming part of it. My mentor used to say that a ship is like the human body. If that's the case, we are definitely standing inside its iron bowels right now."

traits.locale_text: 「一番地味なところを選んだんでしょう。私の恩師はよく、船は人間の体のようなものだと言っていました。もしそうなら私たちは今、間違いなくその鉄の内側に立っていることになります」

languages.text: “那您恐怕来到了这艘船最不起眼的部分。我的导师曾经教导过我，说船就像人的身体一样。照这种说法来看，我们现在肯定是在它的铁肚子里面。”
languages.original_text: "Then you've picked the most unassuming part of it. My mentor used to say that a ship is like the human body. If that's the case, we are definitely standing inside its iron bowels right now."

traits.locale_text: “那您恐怕来到了这艘船最不起眼的部分。我的导师曾经教导过我，说船就像人的身体一样。照这种说法来看，我们现在肯定是在它的铁肚子里面。”

languages.text: "Dann habt Ihr Euch den unscheinbarsten Teil davon ausgesucht. Mein Mentor sagte immer, dass ein Schiff einem Menschenkörper gleicht. Wenn das stimmt, stehen wir jetzt definitiv mitten in seinen eisernen Eingeweiden."
languages.original_text: "Then you've picked the most unassuming part of it. My mentor used to say that a ship is like the human body. If that's the case, we are definitely standing inside its iron bowels right now."

traits.locale_text: "Dann habt Ihr Euch den unscheinbarsten Teil davon ausgesucht. Mein Mentor sagte immer, dass ein Schiff einem Menschenkörper gleicht. Wenn das stimmt, stehen wir jetzt definitiv mitten in seinen eisernen Eingeweiden."

languages.text: « Alors, vous avez choisi le secteur le plus modeste de tous. Mon mentor disait qu'un vaisseau est pareil à un corps humain. Si c'est le cas, nous nous trouvons actuellement dans ses entrailles d'acier. »
languages.original_text: "Then you've picked the most unassuming part of it. My mentor used to say that a ship is like the human body. If that's the case, we are definitely standing inside its iron bowels right now."

traits.locale_text: « Alors, vous avez choisi le secteur le plus modeste de tous. Mon mentor disait qu'un vaisseau est pareil à un corps humain. Si c'est le cas, nous nous trouvons actuellement dans ses entrailles d'acier. »

languages.text: "O hâlde en mütevazı kısmını seçtiniz. Yönderim, bir vakitler gemilerin insan bedenine benzediğini söylerdi. Hâl böyleyse şu anda onun demirden bağırsaklarında bulunduğumuz muhakkak."
languages.original_text: "Then you've picked the most unassuming part of it. My mentor used to say that a ship is like the human body. If that's the case, we are definitely standing inside its iron bowels right now."
